casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth Kelly DUVALL 372P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Kenneth Kelly Duvall, for Duvall, Kenneth Kelly. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of March 2018 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018." Ervin, J. recused
